definition: to mix together (disparate substances)/to mingle/a mix/to be tangled up with
Taiwan pr. used in 夾生|夹生[jia1 sheng1] and 夾竹桃|夹竹桃[jia1 zhu2 tao2]
to press from either side/to place in between/to sandwich/to carry sth under armpit/wedged between/between/to intersperse/to mix/to mingle/clip/folder/Taiwan pr. [jia2]

sentences.english: The engineer interlarded his speech with many technical terms.
sentences.chinese: 這位工程師在他的講話中夾雜着許多術語。

sentences.english: After rolling, these inclusions turn from ball-like shape to chain-like and dot-linked shapes.
sentences.chinese: 夾雜形狀經軋製後由球形逐漸變爲長條形和點鏈狀。

sentences.english: The silt-carrying water gushes out of three specialised holes in the dam.
sentences.chinese: 這些夾雜着泥沙的水流從大壩的三個孔中被排出。

sentences.english: Yellow colour of straw. Apricot nose with mineral aromas.
sentences.chinese: 草黃色，有杏的香氣並夾雜着礦物質的味道。

sentences.english: He speaks with a slight southern accent.
sentences.chinese: 他說話夾雜着南方口音。

sentences.english: Key measures to decrease inclusion are put forward during producing high carbon steel.
sentences.chinese: 提出生產高碳鋼線材過程中減少夾雜物的關鍵措施。

sentences.english: There twines a thread of gold.
Actual situation of multi-resistant Group inclusions, most of the control group evidence.
sentences.chinese: 多耐組均爲虛實夾雜，對照組以實證居多。

sentences.english: Dotted here and there among the students, the ghosts shone misty silver.
sentences.chinese: 幽靈們也夾雜在學生中間，閃爍着模糊的銀光。

sentences.english: In the meantime, these workers were trapped in "immigration limbo."
sentences.chinese: 這些人夾雜在移民大軍中，沒有着落。

sentences.english: Somewhere through the roar sounded the terrified scream of some wounded animal.
sentences.chinese: 震耳欲聾的轟隆聲中分明夾雜着傷獸的咆哮。

sentences.english: Theism generally comes packaged in a religion.
sentences.chinese: 有神論一般都夾雜在宗教之中。

sentences.english: The problem of a single parallel crack near a circular inclusion was also studied.
sentences.chinese: 最後對圓形夾雜附近單平行裂紋問題進行了研究。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a method for removing non-metallic inclusion in molten steel.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及一種鋼液中非金屬夾雜去除方法。

sentences.english: In the third chapter, the domain averaging inclusion method is applied to sliding polycrystals.
sentences.chinese: 第三章進一步將均值等效夾雜法應用於多晶滑錯體。

sentences.english: Inspecting the effect of tundish and the tundish flux on removal of inclusion.
sentences.chinese: 檢驗中間包及中間包覆蓋劑對夾雜去除效果的影響。

definition: to pervade/to fill the air/diffuse/everywhere present/about to inundate (water)/permeated by (smoke)/filled with (dust)/to saturate (the air with fog, smoke etc)
to accompany/to follow/to occur together with/concomitant
vocabulary/list of words (e.g. for language teaching purposes)/word
to have guts/to have courage/to be brave
dense/thick (fog, clouds etc)/to have a strong interest in/deep/fully saturated (color)
to conceal/to hide behind/to cover up
